item.description:
Join us for an exciting evening where you can broadcast your business through elevator pitches, network, brainstorm, and gain insights into leveraging social media and productive networking to grow your business.

This event features a presentation by Jeffrey DeSocio, Principal of AIMC Business Solutions who will be sharing with us how to leverage social media to turn it into productive networking.

Each participant can also contribute one item to the Resource Packet. Bring 35 copies of a helpful article, your business brochure or similar material. A special report, white paper or article you’ve written may likely give you better results than your brochure.

Event sponsors are listed below.

We will follow a structured format:

6:00-6:20pm - Open networking & Registration
6:20-6:30pm - Simple Secrets of Productive Networking
6:30-6:50pm - 30 secs elevator pitches
6:50-7:15pm - Leveraging Social Media for Productive Networking with Jeffrey DeSocio
7:15-8:30pm - Connect yourself to your perfect referrals

 

What to Bring

Bring a pen, notepad, business cards, resource packet contributions (see above), and your smile.

 

Cost

Given the cost of renting meeting space in Boston, a productive, fun event like this would normally cost between $20 and $30. (I know because I've researched a lot of spaces, and I've run events before where I lost money on the venue rental.)

Thanks to the generous sponsorship of the new Microsoft Store, we can make this event available to you at no charge.

 

How to get involved

1. Click to RSVP 'yes' at the above right.

2. Please only RSVP if you truly plan to attend.

3. Change your RSVP right away if your plans change. Being a no show is bad manners and you block someone else from taking part.


Photo/video policy

This event may be photographed, filmed, or audio recorded for the purpose of promoting future events.  By your RSVP and attendance, you acknowledge and consent to your image, likeness, and voice being recorded, published and distributed.  Taking photos, video or the use of recording devices requires the prior permission of the event organizer.


Got Questions?

Ask them in the comments box below so others can benefit from the answers.


Event Sponsors

Event Registration/Checkin
Walter Wise, BPI Strategy Group
http://www.BPIStrategy.com

Resource Packet collation
Susan Ho, Good Neighbor Concierge
http://www.goodneighborconcierge.com

Mini-Workshop
Jeffrey DeSocio, Principal, AIMC Business Solutions
http://www.aimcbizsolutions.com

Door Prizes
Susan Ho, Mark Reinert

Venue
Microsoft Store at Prudential Center
http://content.microsoftstore.com/store/detail/Boston-MA

Host
Mark Reinert, President & Founder, Authentic Business Growth
http://AuthenticBusinessGrowth.com

 

Sponsors Needed for Future Events

Sponsors and Speakers are needed for future monthly events.

You can be a sponsor without spending any money. Review the options on this page http://bit.ly/Q7FI3I and contact Mark Reinert via the Organizer link to sign up to be a sponsor.

 

Save The Date

Our next networking event after this will be Thursday, October 18, 2012.
item.name: Productive Networking & Leveraging Social Media to Grow Your Business
